faq.description: Clear answers about ordering, delivery, customization and materials.

order.q: How do I order a custom wallet?
order.a: Use the configurator to select your model, materials, stitching, and options. Submit your order and we will contact you with confirmation and production details.

payment.a: We currently offer Cash on Delivery (COD) through our cargo delivery partner within North Macedonia.

production.a: Production time depends on configuration and workload. You will receive an estimated timeframe after placing your order.

change.q: Can I change my order after submitting?
change.a: If production has not started, adjustments are usually possible. Contact us immediately with your order details.

s1.title: 1. Business Information
s1.p1: These Terms & Conditions govern the use of the Handstitch website and the purchase of products offered by Handstitch, a registered business operating in the Republic of North Macedonia.
s1.p2: By accessing this website or placing an order, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

s2.title: 2. Nature of Our Products
s2.p1: Handstitch specializes in custom-made leather goods produced based on customer-selected configurations.
s2.p2: Due to the handmade and natural characteristics of leather:
s2.li1: Each product may vary slightly in texture, tone, and grain.
s2.li2: Colors may appear different depending on screen settings and lighting.
s2.li3: Minor variations are not considered defects.
s2.p3: All products are made-to-order unless explicitly stated otherwise.

s3.title: 3. Orders & Acceptance
s3.p1: Submitting an order through the website constitutes an offer to purchase.
s3.li2: Cancel orders due to incomplete information, suspected fraud, or production limitations.
s3.li3: Contact customers for clarification before production begins.
s3.p3: An order is considered confirmed only after review and production acceptance.

s4.title: 4. Pricing
s4.p1: All prices are displayed in MKD (Macedonian Denar).
s4.p2: Handstitch reserves the right to modify prices at any time. However, once an order is confirmed, the agreed price will not change.

s5.title: 5. Payment Terms
s5.p1: Payment is made via Cash on Delivery (COD) through our designated cargo delivery partner.
s5.li1: Full payment is required at the time of delivery.
s5.li2: Customers must ensure someone is available to receive and pay for the package.
s5.li3: Refusal to accept delivery without valid reason may result in future order restrictions.

s6.title: 6. Production & Delivery
s6.p1: Production time depends on product complexity, current order volume, and material availability. Estimated production times are provided for reference and are not legally binding.
s6.p2: Delivery is available only within the Republic of North Macedonia.
s6.p3: Handstitch is not responsible for delays caused by cargo services once the package has been handed over to the delivery partner.
s6.p4: Risk of loss transfers to the customer upon delivery.

s7.title: 7. Returns & Refunds
s7.p1: Because all products are custom-made according to customer-selected configurations, returns are not accepted except in the following cases:
s7.li4: The customer must notify Handstitch within 24 hours of delivery.
s7.li5: Clear photographic evidence must be provided.
s7.p3: Normal wear, minor variations, or dissatisfaction with customization choices do not qualify as defects.

s8.title: 8. Vouchers & Promotions
s8.p1: Handstitch may offer discount vouchers or promotional codes. Handstitch reserves the right to modify or cancel voucher campaigns at any time, refuse voucher use in cases of suspected abuse, and invalidate improperly applied discounts.
s8.p2: Vouchers have no cash value unless explicitly stated.

s9.title: 9. Intellectual Property
s9.p1: All website content including designs, product models, images, branding, text, and configuration systems are the intellectual property of Handstitch and may not be reproduced, copied, or distributed without written permission.

s10.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
s10.p1: Handstitch shall not be liable for indirect or consequential damages, loss of profits, or delays caused by third-party services.
s10.p2: In any case, liability shall not exceed the total value of the purchased product.

s11.title: 11. Fraud & Misuse
s11.p1: Handstitch reserves the right to refuse service to individuals engaging in fraudulent activity, repeated refusal of COD deliveries, abuse of voucher systems, or disruptive and malicious behavior.

s12.title: 12. Governing Law
s12.p1: These Terms & Conditions are governed by the laws of the Republic of North Macedonia. Any disputes shall be subject to the jurisdiction of the competent courts in North Macedonia.

s13.title: 13. Changes to These Terms
s13.p1: Handstitch reserves the right to update these Terms at any time. Updated versions will be posted on the website with a revised “Last updated” date.

s1.title: 1. Introduction
s1.p1: Handstitch is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or purchase our products.

s2.title: 2. Information We Collect
s2.p1: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as your name, email address, phone number, and delivery address when you place an order.
s2.p2: We also collect information about your order history and preferences.

s3.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
s3.li2: Communicate with you about your order.
s3.li3: Internal record keeping and business analysis.

s4.title: 4. Data Security
s4.p1: We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.

s5.title: 5. Third-Party Services
s5.p1: We may share your information with third-party service providers, such as delivery partners, to fulfill your orders.

s6.title: 6. Your Rights
s6.p1: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. Please contact us if you wish to exercise these rights.
